page.title: 03 THE GEOG.TEACHERS' VIEW
page.content:
This is an ideal area for geography field-work as an W-E transect shows changes in relief & land use related to the influence of geology & drainage. { COMMONS DIP SLOPE FLOOD PLAIN }HT. >900m 90-10m < 10M
GEOL B.Salterton Pebble Beds Alluvium Pebble Beds overlain by over sand very porous Otter sst. -stone
RE- Cuesta of Flight of Water mead LIEF Pebble Beds terraces on -dows & & infertile dip-slope, naturally SOIL podzols. fertile liable to soils. flooding.
LAND Heath, Forestry, Permanent USE Recreation arable & pasture & Marines. settlement. recreation G.R 040860 080850 {by Annmaree Kain & Joan Ross Exmouth}
